i like the beatles.

content.text: Hi! I'm excited to hear that you're going to see Justin Timberlake in concert! I'm a big fan of his too. What's your favorite song of his?
Hello! I'm so excited too, I've been a fan of his for a long time. My favorite song of his is probably "Cry Me a River." What's yours?
My favorite song of his is "Mirrors." I love the lyrics and the melody.
That's a great song too! I love the music video.
Me too! Have you been to any other concerts recently?
Not recently, but I went to see Lady Gaga in concert a few years ago. It was an amazing show!
I've heard that her concerts are really good. I'd love to see her perform live someday.
You definitely should! She's an incredible performer.
I'm going to have to check her out soon. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
